question: I am a confining mother. At the end of my confinement it is compulsory for me to have a ghusl bath. Is it compulsory for the baby to have ghusl and read namaaz with parent.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
The maximum period of confinement is 40 days. A female's period of
confinement (Nifaas) ends upon the bleeding ending even if it is before 40
days. Thereafter, she must take a bath to purify herself and perform Salaat.
Salaat is not compulsory upon a baby.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
